TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DispatcherHookEventHandler(object sender, DispatcherHookEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DispatcherHookEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DispatcherHookEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DispatcherHookEventArgs)
public delegate void DispatcherHookEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DispatcherHookEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.summary: 表示將處理 相關事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個委派會處理下列事件：
<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks.OperationPriorityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>
<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks.OperationPosted?displayProperty=nameWithType>

<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks.OperationAborted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
